Jan. 14, 2017 D Butlins Mineworkers (Third Section)
Butlins Mineworkers (Third Section) 30 Test Piece Contest Butlins Mineworkers butlins-mineworkers-third-section
None
Third
The Lion and the Rose
Butlins Skegness (Crazy Horse Theatre), Skegness, Lincolnshire, England, UK Highest Placed Mining Band: Shirland Welfare
Skelmersdale band were also thought to be entered by the organisers and were listed in the programme, conductor Karl Stott, draw number 1, but this was an administrative error; the band had not entered.
Jan. 24, 2016, 4:47 p.m. Jan. 19, 2017, 8:28 a.m.
1 Shirland Welfare Band Lynden Cooper
2 Greenfield Band Tom Haslam
